title: Why doesn\'t DOT notify drivers sooner that they will need to merge left at the junction of Hwy. 17 North and Hwy. 74/76 in Leland?  Currently the two posted signs are around the curve and can not be seen until the lane ends and it\'s too late.  I have seen numerous crashes at this junction that could have been avoided had drivers been given notice sooner that the lane would end and the need to merge left.
